basket (ball),zsmkeranjang,idbola basket
basket (general),zsmbakul,idkeranjang
because,zsmkerana
idmatras influenced by Dutch nlmatras, idtempat tidur, idranjang, idkasur
idbaliho (supposedly from English ballyhoo (in English it means extravagant publicity or fuss)) idpapan iklan, idpapan reklame from Dutch nlreclame (advertisement)
idmiliar (from Dutch nlmiljard), idmilyar (informal but frequently used)
idbus, idbis nonstandard, influenced by Dutch pronunciation
idterminal bus ( frequently pronounced as terminal idbis as it is derived from Dutch pronunciation of bus )
1. idpemberhentian bus, 2. idhalte bus from Dutch nlbushalte
idkawat (e.g. copper wire), idkabel (e.g. electrical wire, cable)
